Messages.WelcomeMessage:
Hello! This bot can show you information about movies. Just send the movie's name, and the bot will display details about it. 

You can also use the /keyboard command to access five buttons: 
/detailed, 
/plot, 
/filmmakers, 
/general, 
/awards. 
Each button provides different information about the movie. 

Additionally, you can score films with like or dislike to express your opinion. Enjoy exploring movies with the bot!
